回想中熱くなりお茶いかが？\r\n: The heat rising during recollection, I ask 'want some tea?'
冷静に大人で\r\n: In a calm and mature way
ハートは君にまだ教えずに\r\n: I won't tell you my heart yet
ご相談チラチラと\r\n: Getting advice, stealing a glimpse or two
余裕 身に着けて言う「お相手はYou？」\r\n: Presenting a calm composure, I asked 「Are you my partner?」
ドラマのようなことしない女優\r\n: I'm just an actress who doesn't do drama
噛めば噛むほど美味しい\r\n: The more you know me, the more you'll savor this scrumptious lady
Lady例に甘え方を見せてほしい\r\n: So show me how to act a bit needy
はみ出したい ん～変われないの\r\n: I want to stick out, hmm~ but I can't change
自由型のいい子は好き放題\r\n: A freestyle good girl can do as she pleases
その塩梅 も～わからないの\r\n: That discretion... come on, don't you realize?
優しいふりしてただ焦ってる \r\n: I act like I'm being nice, but I'm just fretting
そっと口角上げ君を...魅せ君を...\r\n: I gently raise the corners of my mouth, charming you...
そっと心タップ 君を...あぁ君を\r\n: Gently tapping your heart, oh, I want to...
優しいふりしてただ焦って\r\n: I act like I'm being nice, but I'm just...
ん～はしゃげないの\r\n: Hmm~ can't I have more fun?
まるっと上手くリードしたいけど\r\n: I want to get better at taking the lead, but
そのボーダー も～超えらんないの\r\n: I can't cross, sigh~ that border
そもそもの話まだ隠して\r\n: When it comes down to it, I'm still hiding it
